DOC.brief_summary: This study develop model assessment successful activation/engagement estrogen receptor beta use salivary biomarkers .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Effect Estrogen Estrogen Receptor Biomarkers Healthy Postmenopausal Women ( 0000-094 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Subject healthy , postmenopausal woman least 40 year age onset menopause within 10 year screen Subject normal mammogram screen Subject normal Papsmear within 3 year screen . Subjects Papsmear last 3 year option test screening Subject agree avoid medication cause dry mouth otherwise affect saliva flow Subject willing avoid strenuous exercise study Subject willing avoid use mouthwash salt water rinse study Subject willing avoid use teeth whiten product Subject willing avoid eating and/or drinking grapefruit product Subject willing limit alcohol consumption 2 drink day Subject willing limit caffeine consumption 3 cup coffee ( equivalent ) per day Subject nonsmoker Subject history multiple and/or severe allergy drug food Subject cold viral infection within 2 week Visit 2 Subject take antibiotic within 2 week Visit 2 Subject need dental work procedure study Subject use estrogen progesterone preparation product contain phytoestrogens within 3 month screen Subject unable discontinue anticoagulant
